name: voicefox
description: This is a WebExtension that allows the browser to be voice-controlled.

scripts.start: mkdir -p Profile && web-ext run --firefox-profile Profile/ --keep-profile-changes --firefox nightly --source-dir extension/ --browser-console
scripts.build:deps: for file in bodymovin/build/player/bodymovin.min.js speaktome-api/build/stm_web.min.js webextension-polyfill/dist/browser-polyfill.min.js moment/min/moment.min.js fuse.js/dist/fuse.js ; do cp node_modules/$file extension/js/vendor/ ; done
scripts.package: npm-run-all build:* && web-ext build -s extension --overwrite-dest && mv web-ext-artifacts/*.zip addon.xpi
